key_themes: AI infrastructure and enterprise productivity adoption
Fed rate policy easing versus supervisory tightening
Employment and GDP deterioration versus equity valuations
Mega-cap quality consolidation as defensive positioning
Index inclusion mechanics and year-end flows
risk_factors: Employment weakness evidenced by private payroll deterioration and truck sales lows
Q4 earnings guidance cuts from software/fintech sectors
Banking sector capital requirement increases and regulatory tightening
Disconnect between equity valuations and underlying economic fundamentals
Geopolitical escalation and crypto platform security vulnerabilities
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $700 call wall resistance (active hedging 2% away), Max Pain gravitational pull at $684. QQQ: $620 resistance (ACTIVE, 0% away), $619 Max Pain support. Watch for dealer hedging flows near these strikes.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Upside limited by $700 call wall (146k OI), with extended resistance at $730 (47k OI) and $750 (55k OI). Downside protected by $640 put wall (153k OI) until approached. QQQ: $640 call wall caps rallies (35k OI), $590 put wall provides structural support (164k OI).
